title: Danny Cowling
text:
Danny Cowling (born ) is an English <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays for the <a href="Batley%20Bulldogs">Batley Bulldogs</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Championship">Betfred Championship</a>.
He also played for <a href="Halifax%20R.L.F.C.">Halifax</a>, <a href="Wakefield%20Trinity">Wakefield Trinity</a> in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a>, and was <a href="Super%20League%23Dual%20registration">dual-registered</a> with <a href="Doncaster%20R.L.F.C.">Doncaster</a>.
He was previously signed with <a href="Doncaster%20R.L.F.C.">Doncaster</a>.
